constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: DISIA New Malden District Centre Inset Area
ART4 New Malden District Centre Inset Area

description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Openings/Windows), 7 (Landscaping and Planting Scheme), 8 (Construction Logistics Plan), 9 (Refuse and Recycling), 12 (Noise Insulation),13 (Environmental Construction Management Plan), and 14 (Contaminated Land Assessment) of planning permission 17/14193/FUL (Change of use of site from car sales to residential use. Erection of part single/ part two/ part three storey building for use as nine self-contained flats with roof terraces/ amenity space and cycle parking provision)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: No relevant information has been submitted in relation to condition 8 (Construction Logistics Plan) of planning permission 17/14193/FUL and therefore it has not been demonstrated that all works on site would not result in an adverse impact on the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and would not compromise highway safety and the free flow of traffic, contrary to Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The submitted information in relation to condition 9 (Refuse and Recycling) of planning permission 17/14193/FUL is not considered to be sufficient to ensure adequate provision of refuse facilities for all the occupiers, contrary to Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
site_name: 17-19 Dukes AvenueNew MaldenKingston Upon ThamesKT3 4HL
